title: Butterfly 5.4 Release Notes
content:
Butterfly 5.4 Release NotesNew Features
Update dependency versions to latest in plugins.yml
Support for Fancybox v6
Add configuration option to display article title in navigation bar
Add hover tooltip to show â€œBack to Homeâ€ text in article page navigation bar
Add Google Tag Manager configuration support
Add animation effects for right-side configuration button, update related configurations and template logic
Update footer configuration, add navigation bar and copyright information, improve styles and structure

Improvements
Enhanced user interface responsiveness
Better mobile experience
Optimized loading performance
Improved accessibility features

Bug Fixes
Fixed various minor issues
Improved compatibility with latest Hexo versions
Enhanced stability across different browsers



Migration GuideTo upgrade to Butterfly 5.4:

Backup your current configuration
Update the theme files
Review and update your _config.yml if needed
Test your site thoroughly

Breaking ChangesPlease refer to the documentation for any breaking changes that might affect your current setup.
Whatâ€™s NextWeâ€™re continuously working on improving Butterfly theme. Stay tuned for more exciting features in upcoming releases!
Thank you for using Butterfly theme!

title: Butterfly - Get Started
content:
Butterfly - Get StartedButterfly document - Get Started
This article is translated from ChatGPT.
ğŸ“š Table of Contents

ğŸš€ Get Started
ğŸ“‘ Theme Pages
ğŸ“Œ Theme Configuration
âš”ï¸ Tag Plugins
â“ Q&A
âš¡ï¸ Advanced Tutorials

hexo-theme-butterfly is a theme developed based on hexo-theme-melody.
InstallationGit InstallationIn your Hexo root directory:
git clone -b master https://github.com/jerryc127/hexo-theme-butterfly.git themes/butterfly

npm InstallationIf you are in mainland China and have difficulty accessing GitHub
npm install hexo-theme-butterfly

Stable Version [Recommended]In your Hexo root directory:
git clone -b master https://gitee.com/immyw/hexo-theme-butterfly.git themes/butterfly

ConfigurationModify the theme in your hexoâ€™s root directory _config.yml
theme: butterfly

Getting StartedAfter installation, you can start customizing your blog with the beautiful Butterfly theme.


FeaturesButterfly offers many amazing features:

Beautiful and responsive design
Multiple layout options
Rich sidebar widgets
Powerful search functionality
Comment system support
And much more!

Enjoy your new beautiful blog with Butterfly theme!

title: Hexo Tutorial - Building Your First Blog
content:
Hexo Tutorial - Building Your First BlogWelcome to the comprehensive Hexo tutorial! In this guide, weâ€™ll walk you through creating your first blog using Hexo static site generator.
What is Hexo?Hexo is a fast, simple and powerful blog framework powered by Node.js. It supports:

Markdown - Write posts in Markdown
Lightning Fast - Hundreds of files take only seconds to build
Plugin System - Powerful plugin system for extensibility
Themes - Beautiful themes available

PrerequisitesBefore we start, make sure you have:

Node.js installed
Git installed
Basic knowledge of command line



InstallationInstall Hexo CLInpm install -g hexo-cli

Create a new bloghexo init my-blogcd my-blognpm install

Basic CommandsCreate a new posthexo new "My First Post"

Generate static fileshexo generate

Start local serverhexo server

Deploy your bloghexo deploy

Writing Your First Post
Create a new post: hexo new "Hello World"
Edit the generated file in source/_posts/
Add your content in Markdown format
Save and preview with hexo server

CustomizationThemesYou can customize your blog with beautiful themes:
git clone https://github.com/theme-author/theme-name.git themes/theme-name

ConfigurationEdit _config.yml to customize:

Site information
Theme settings
Deployment options
Plugin configurations

Best Practices
Regular Backups - Keep your source files safe
Version Control - Use Git for version control
SEO Optimization - Use proper titles and descriptions
Mobile Friendly - Choose responsive themes

ConclusionHexo is an excellent choice for creating static blogs. With its simplicity and powerful features, you can focus on writing great content while Hexo handles the technical aspects.
Happy blogging with Hexo!

title: Hello World
content:
Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.
Quick StartCreate a new post$ hexo new "My New Post"

More info: Writing
Run server$ hexo server

More info: Server
Generate static files$ hexo generate

More info: Generating
Deploy to remote sites$ hexo deploy

More info: Deployment
